sofya.ed.semantic
Class SemanticEventData

java.lang.Object
  sofya.ed.semantic.SemanticEventData

public class SemanticEventData
extends java.lang.Object

Contains information generated by the instrumentor which is necessary for the semantic event dispatcher to operate.

This class will contain a string table and a compiled version of the module description, and other information as needed.

Version:
01/11/2007
Author:
Alex Kinneer

getSuiteName

public java.lang.String getSuiteName()
Gets the name associated with the suite of event specifications represented by this data object.

Returns:
The name associated with this suite of event specifications.

getEventSpecificationCount

Gets the number of event specifications in this suite.

Returns:
The number of event specifications contained in this suite.

getEventSpecification

public EventSpecification getEventSpecification(java.lang.String key)
Gets an event specification by its key.

Parameters:
key - Key used to identify the event specification to retrieve.
Returns:
The event specification associated with the given key.

getEventSpecificationsArray

public EventSpecification[] getEventSpecificationsArray(boolean shared)
Gets all of the event specifications in the suite contained in this data object, as an array for maximum efficiency.

The result of this call may be cached to speed up future queries for shared references. However, if no other object holds a reference to the array, the result of this method is not guaranteed to be the same array on subsequent calls, even when the shared flag is true.

Parameters:
shared - Flag indicating whether the return value of this method is permitted to be an array that might be shared with other callers of this method.
Returns:
An array of the event specifications in the suite contained in this data object.

getCallInterceptors

public java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object> getCallInterceptors()
Gets the names of all of the call interceptor methods added by the instrumentor.

Returns:
A map from class names to sets containing the names of the inserted call interceptors.

getString

public java.lang.String getString(int index)
Gets a string from the string table.

Parameters:
index - Index to the desired string in the string table.
Returns:
The string corresponding to the given index.

getStringTable

public java.lang.String[] getStringTable()
Gets a copy of the full string table.

Returns:
The complete string table. Changes to this array will not be reflected internally.
